H0.text: Krakatoa is part of which country. Malaysia

H1.text: Krakatoa is part of which country. Philippines

H2.text: Krakatoa is part of which country. Papua New Guinea

H3.text: Krakatoa is part of which country. INDONESIA

A4.text: Krakatoa (), also transcribed Krakatau (), is now a caldera in the Sunda Strait between the islands of Java and Sumatra in the Indonesian province of Lampung.
